name: n8n-nodes-base.spreadsheetFile
description: Reads and writes data from a spreadsheet file like CSV, XLS, ODS, etc

properties.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
properties.name: oldVersionNotice

options.name: Read From File
options.description: Reads data from a spreadsheet file
options.action: Read data from a spreadsheet file

options.name: Write to File
options.description: Writes the workflow data to a spreadsheet file
options.action: Write data to a spreadsheet file

properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.hint: The name of the input field containing the file data to be processed

properties.name: fileFormat

options.name: CSV
options.description: Comma-separated values

options.name: HTML
options.description: HTML Table

options.name: ODS
options.description: OpenDocument Spreadsheet

options.name: RTF
options.description: Rich Text Format

options.name: XLS
options.description: Excel

options.name: XLSX
options.description: Excel

properties.description: The format of the file to save the data as

properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

options.name: delimiter
options.description: Set the field delimiter, usually a comma

options.name: enableBOM
options.description: Whether to detect and exclude the byte-order-mark from the CSV Input if present

options.name: relaxQuotes
options.description: Whether to handle unclosed quotes in CSV fields as part of the field's content instead of throwing a parsing error

options.name: headerRow
options.description: Whether the first row of the file contains the header names

options.name: includeEmptyCells
options.description: Whether to include empty cells when reading from file. They will be filled with an empty string.

options.displayName: Max Number of Rows to Load
options.name: maxRowCount
options.description: Stop handling records after the requested number of rows are read. Use -1 if you want to load all rows.

options.name: range
options.description: The range to read from the table. If set to a number it will be the starting row. If set to string it will be used as A1-style notation range.

options.name: rawData
options.description: Whether to return RAW data, instead of parsing it

options.name: readAsString
options.description: In some cases and file formats, it is necessary to read as string to ensure special characters are interpreted correctly

options.name: sheetName
options.description: Name of the sheet to read from in the spreadsheet (if supported). If not set, the first one will be chosen.

options.name: fromLine
options.description: Start handling records from the requested line number. Starts at 0.

options.name: compression
options.description: Whether compression will be applied or not

options.name: fileName
options.description: File name to set in binary data. By default will "spreadsheet.<fileFormat>" be used.

options.name: headerRow
options.description: Whether the first row of the file contains the header names

options.name: sheetName
options.description: Name of the sheet to create in the spreadsheet

options.description: Occurs whenever an application fee is refunded, whether from refunding a charge or from refunding the application fee directly. This includes partial refunds.

options.name: Application Fee.refund.updated
options.description: Occurs whenever an application fee refund is updated.

options.name: Balance Available
options.description: Occurs whenever your Stripe balance has been updated (e.g., when a charge is available to be paid out). By default, Stripe automatically transfers funds in your balance to your bank account on a daily basis.

options.name: Capability Updated
options.description: Occurs whenever a capability has new requirements or a new status.

options.name: Charge Captured
options.description: Occurs whenever a previously uncaptured charge is captured.

options.name: Charge Expired
options.description: Occurs whenever an uncaptured charge expires.

options.description: Occurs whenever a pending charge is created.

options.description: Occurs whenever a charge is refunded, including partial refunds.

options.description: Occurs whenever a customer disputes a charge with their bank.

options.description: Occurs when funds are reinstated to your account after a dispute is closed. This includes partially refunded payments.

options.name: Charge Dispute.funds_withdrawn
options.description: Occurs when funds are removed from your account due to a dispute.

options.name: Charge Dispute.updated

name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.chainSummarization
description: Transforms text into a concise summary

properties.displayName: Save time with an example of how this node works
properties.name: notice
type
properties.description: The type of summarization to run

options.name: Map Reduce (Recommended)
options.description: Summarize each document (or chunk) individually, then summarize those summaries

options.name: Refine
options.description: Summarize the first document (or chunk). Then update that summary based on the next document (or chunk), and repeat.

options.name: Stuff
options.description: Pass all documents (or chunks) at once. Ideal for small datasets.

options.name: combineMapPrompt
options.hint: The prompt to combine individual summaries
options.default:
Write a concise summary of the following:


"{text}"


CONCISE SUMMARY:

options.default:
Your job is to produce a final summary
We have provided an existing summary up to a certain point: "{existing_answer}"
We have the opportunity to refine the existing summary
(only if needed) with some more context below.

"{text}"
------------

Given the new context, refine the original summary
